inherited_effect: [Your Turn] While this Digimon has [Insectoid] in its traits, it gains <Piercing> (When this Digimon attacks and deletes an opponent's Digimon and survives the battle, it performs any security checks it normally would).

card_effect: [Your Turn] When this Digimon would digivolve into a card with 2 colors or [Composite] in its traits, reduce the digivolution cost by 2.
inherited_effect: [When Attacking] For each of this Digimon’s colors, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.

card_effect: When this card is trashed from your Deck, gain 1 memory.
inherited_effect: [When Attacking] You may reveal 1 purple card from your hand and place it on top of your deck.

card_effect: [On Play] If you have a red Tamer in play, delete 1 of your opponent's Digimon with 3000 DP or less.
[On Play] If you have a purple Tamer in play, delete 1 of your opponent's level 3 Digimon.
[On Play] If you have a yellow Tamer in play, 1 of your opponent's Digimon gets -2000 DP until the end of their turn.

inherited_effect: [Your Turn] (Once Per Turn) When one of your opponent's digivolution cards is trashed, gain 1 memory.

card_effect: [Main] Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 red Digimon card among them to your hand. Place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order. Then, place this card in your battle area.[Main] <Delay> (Trash this card in your battle area to activate the effect below. You can't activate this effect the turn this card enters play.)・Gain 2 memory.
security_effect: [Security] Place this card in its owner's battle area.

card_effect: [On Deletion] You may play a purple Digimon Card with a level of 4 or less from your trash without paying its memory cost. Any [On Play] effects on Digimon played with this effect don't activate.
